titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 5109) to amend title 38, United States Code, to improve the personnel system of the Veterans Health Administration, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 106-875, by Mr. Diaz-Balart.

Rule provides for consideration of H.R. 5109 with 1 hour of general debate. Previous question shall be considered as ordered without intervening motions except motion to recommit with or without instructions. The bill shall be considered in the House and the amendment recommended by the Committee on Veterans' Affairs now printed in the bill shall be considered as adopted. Measure will be considered read. A specified amendment is in order.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 281.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 585.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 9/20/2000--Introduced. Sets forth the rule for consideration of H.R. 5109 (modifying the personnel system of the Veterans Health Administration).
